title: This Week in Tech: Cadex’s New Aero Tire, Whoop Unveils New Hardware, and a Sub 10 kg E-Bike
content:
MyWhoosh unveils a $1 million prize purse for its Championships, sub 10-kg e-bike with custom brakes, and more this week in tech.

Read the full article at This Week in Tech: Cadex’s New Aero Tire, Whoop Unveils New Hardware, and a Sub 10 kg E-Bike on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
